name: Obelisk Variants: The Language of Ritual

pages.title: The Sacred Geometry
pages.text: The obelisks that stand at the four quarters of your ritual circle are not mere stone sentinels - they are living runes, each variant carrying specific meaning and power. When arranged in the sacred pattern, their variants determine the very nature of the ritual that manifests.$(br2)$(ritual)Each obelisk can be cycled through seven variants using the $(obelisk)Chisel$(reset), and each variant serves a distinct purpose in ritual configuration.$(br2)The ancient texts speak of this as 'The Language of the Stones' - a system where the position and variant of each obelisk creates a unique ritual signature.

pages.title: North Obelisk: Ritual Type
pages.text: The $(obelisk)North Obelisk$(reset) determines the fundamental nature of your ritual:$(br2)$(barrier)$(b)Variant 4:$(reset) Shield Rune - Activates $(barrier)Barrier Mode$(reset)$(br)$(effect)$(b)Variant 5:$(reset) Poison Rune - Activates $(effect)Effect Mode$(reset)$(br)$(effect)$(b)Variant 7:$(reset) Blessing Rune - Activates $(effect)Effect Mode$(reset)$(br)$(dim)$(b)Variant 0:$(reset) Blank Rune - Invalid ritual$(br2)The North obelisk is the keystone - without a valid variant here, no ritual can manifest. The ancient wardens knew that all power flows from the northern quarter.

pages.title: East Obelisk: Shape & Effect
pages.text: The $(obelisk)East Obelisk$(reset) defines the secondary properties of your ritual:$(br2)$(barrier)In $(barrier)Barrier Mode:$(reset)$(br)$(b)Variant 1:$(reset) Square Barrier - Rectangular protection$(br)$(b)Variant 2:$(reset) Circular Barrier - Spherical protection$(br)$(dim)$(b)Variant 0:$(reset) Invalid shape$(br2)$(effect)In $(effect)Effect Mode:$(reset)$(br)$(b)Variant 5:$(reset) Poison Effect - Harmful to denied players$(br)$(b)Variant 6:$(reset) Regeneration Effect - Beneficial to allowed players$(br)$(dim)$(b)Variant 0:$(reset) Invalid effect$(br2)The East obelisk channels the rising sun's energy, determining whether your ritual creates walls or applies effects.

pages.title: South Obelisk: Strength & Power
pages.text: The $(obelisk)South Obelisk$(reset) governs the potency of your ritual:$(br2)$(b)Variant 1:$(reset) Weak Power - Minimal effect$(br)$(b)Variant 2:$(reset) Moderate Power - Balanced effect$(br)$(b)Variant 3:$(reset) Strong Power - Maximum effect$(br)$(dim)$(b)Variant 0:$(reset) No power$(br2)$(barrier)In $(barrier)Barrier Mode:$(reset) Controls barrier durability (1000, 2000, or 3000 points)$(br)$(effect)In $(effect)Effect Mode:$(reset) Controls effect amplifier (0, 1, or 2 levels)$(br2)The South obelisk draws from the earth's deep strength, determining how long your ritual can endure or how potent its effects become.

pages.title: West Obelisk: Duration & Regeneration
pages.text: The $(obelisk)West Obelisk$(reset) controls the temporal aspects of your ritual:$(br2)$(b)Variant 1:$(reset) Slow Regeneration - Minimal recovery$(br)$(b)Variant 2:$(reset) Moderate Regeneration - Balanced recovery$(br)$(b)Variant 3:$(reset) Fast Regeneration - Rapid recovery$(br)$(dim)$(b)Variant 0:$(reset) No regeneration$(br2)$(barrier)In $(barrier)Barrier Mode:$(reset) Controls barrier regeneration rate (5, 10, or 15 points per second)$(br)$(effect)In $(effect)Effect Mode:$(reset) Controls effect duration (5, 10, or 15 seconds per level)$(br2)The West obelisk governs the setting sun's wisdom, determining how quickly your ritual recovers or how long its effects persist.

pages.title: Ritual Validation
pages.text: $(ritual)Important:$(reset) Not all obelisk configurations create valid rituals!$(br2)$(b)Valid Ritual Requirements:$(reset)$(br)$(obelisk)North:$(reset) Must be variant 4, 5, or 7$(br)$(obelisk)East:$(reset) Must match ritual type (1-2 for barrier, 5-6 for effect)$(br)$(obelisk)South:$(reset) Must be variant 1, 2, or 3$(br)$(obelisk)West:$(reset) Must be variant 1, 2, or 3$(br2)$(dim)If any obelisk is variant 0 (blank), the ritual will fail to activate.$(br2)The ancient texts warn: 'Only the complete pattern awakens the sleeping power. Incomplete runes bring only silence.'

pages.title: Example Configurations
pages.text: $(b)Barrier Ritual Examples:$(reset)$(br)$(barrier)North=4, East=1, South=3, West=2$(reset)$(br)Creates a $(barrier)strong square barrier$(reset) with $(barrier)moderate regeneration$(reset)$(br2)$(barrier)North=4, East=2, South=2, West=3$(reset)$(br)Creates a $(barrier)moderate circular barrier$(reset) with $(barrier)fast regeneration$(reset)$(br2)$(b)Effect Ritual Examples:$(reset)$(br)$(effect)North=7, East=5, South=3, West=2$(reset)$(br)Creates a $(effect)strong poison effect$(reset) with $(effect)moderate duration$(reset)$(br2)$(effect)North=5, East=6, South=2, West=3$(reset)$(br)Creates a $(effect)moderate regeneration effect$(reset) with $(effect)fast duration$(reset)
